item.description:
Inspired by their rich heritage of Celtic music and fired by the strength of today’s Scottish cultural scene (which they themselves have done much to create and fuel), the Battlefield Band mix the old songs with new self-penned material, and perform them on a unique fusion of ancient and modern instruments — bagpipe, fiddle, synthesizer, guitar, cittern, flute, bodhran and accordion. This is the gold standard, the band against which all others are measured. Check them out on YouTube - they are fabulous!!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=TX5RbEXjdPI#!

BUY YOUR TICKET ($22 + fee) HERE: http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/251953

 

You can also buy at the door if they aren't sold out...$25

 

Plus $1 to Ange to help cover Organizer fees (pay on the night).

 

Let me know if you can get there in time for dinner at 6. 30 pm at Jack Tar on Washington Street in Marblehead. I know it's a bit of a scramble to get to Marblehead on a Friday night! If not, we'll see you in the Unitarian Church. They usually save seats for us if there are quite a few of us..
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside at 7.45 pm OR meet at 6.30 pm for dinner at Jack Tar's restaurant
item.name: Celtic Music!! Battlefield Band at the Me and Thee Coffeehouse in Marblehead
